orig_text: On the other hand, there are cases where users wish to manage printers specifically, not to discover web pages in general, and it is good accommodate this.
correct_text: On the other hand, there are cases where users wish to manage printers specifically, not to discover web pages in general, and it is good to accommodate this.
notes:
